title: Topic 005 Question 033
body: You are developing an online game that includes a feature that allows players to interact with other players on the same team within a certain distance. The calculation to determine the players in range occurs when players move and are cached in an Azure Cache for Redis instance.
The system should prioritize players based on how recently they have moved and should not prioritize players who have logged out of the game.
You need to select an eviction policy.
Which eviction policy should you use?
